# JsonWebServiceClientSettings.RequestSettings property

Gets or sets the request settings.

```csharp
public WebServiceRequestSettings RequestSettings { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

The request settings.

## Remarks

Only one of RequestSettings and RequestSettingsCreator can be set.
